titleStmt.title: A discovrse of the originall and fundamentall cause of naturall, customary, arbitrary, voluntary and necessary warre with the mystery of invasive warre : that ecclesiasticall prelates, have alwayes beene subject to temporall princes ... / by Sir Walter Rawleigh ...
titleStmt.author: Raleigh, Walter, Sir, 1552?-1618.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.W. for Humphrey Moseley ...,
